attributes.action: read carefully and implement any petition which exceeds  500,000  signatures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some petitions are more popular than others. If a petition reaches a very high number of signatures, ie  more than 500,000, then it deserves to be taken most seriously and acted upon

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
